column5: I was looking for a handheld GPS at the show yesterday and came away empty handed. Today I went to Canadian Tire and found a Magellan Explorist 500LE marked down from $299 to $109   I know I will be happy with this because it is the same one that got stolen out of my truck last year  They have 4 or 5 left if anybody is looking for one.
ive seen that same one on sale at the CTC around  here.  are you able to load lake maps and all of that on it?
ya it has an SD card slot to add maps, you can get a bunch of different maps and the marine one is exactly the same as Navionics Gold
